channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Grafiti on brick wall elevation of 112 Anerley Road, 25th February
item.description:
Non offensive grafiti of white spray on brown brick wall of 112 Anerley Road, at the junction of Anerley Road and Hamlet road. Two pieces approx. 30cm by 20cm each.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 112, Anerley Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Household rubbish dumped, 25th February
item.description:
3 suitcase and a black bag of rubbish dumped on grass outside the bungalows. The rubbish from the black bag has blown down the grass through to Kingsholm Gardens. Needs a litter pick

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rancliffe Gardens, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped Fridge, 25th February
item.description:
Fly tipped fridge near the junction of Nelson Road and Raglan Road. Located on the south side of Nelson Road. Blocking narrow pavement making it difficult for prams and wheelchairs to get past.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nelson Road, Upper Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 1 Windmill Hill, 25th February
item.description:
The kerb and paving stones have been severely damaged, creating grave risks to the elderly and blind people. Every week, the Veolia bin lorry drives onto the kerb and damages it. The damage has been present for over a month. Thank you very much for your assistance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Frognal Rise, West Hampstead, Greater London
